alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 12:51AM CST until March 03 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WEBSTER...SOUTHEASTERN DE SOTO...RED RIVER... NORTHWESTERN NATCHITOCHES...SOUTHWESTERN BIENVILLE...SOUTHEASTERN BOSSIER AND NORTHEASTERN SABINE PARISHES... At 1250 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ringgold to 8 miles northwest of Hornbeck, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Coushatta, Zwolle, Ringgold, Campti, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Natchez, Martin, Clarence, Hall Summit, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Noble, Edgefield and Bienville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster
